mean_cn: adj. 集体的，共同的；  n. 集体
mean_en: shared or done by a group of people; involving all members of a group
word_etyma: collect收集 + ive形容词后缀 → collective 集体的
short_phrase: The people make a collective decision.
sentence: Class fund is collective property. It needs everybody to contribute.
sentence_trans: 班费是集体财产。它需要每个人的贡献。
